概要: 入れ子 | フィールド | コンストラクタ | メソッド 詳細: フィールド | コンストラクタ | メソッド

com.erdao.maps.markerclusterer
クラス GeoClusterer

java.lang.Object
  com.erdao.maps.markerclusterer.GeoClusterer

public class GeoClusterer
extends Object

Class for Clustering geotagged content. this clustering came from "markerclusterer" which is available as opensource at http://code.google.com/p/gmaps-utility-library/ this is android ported version with modification to fit to the application

作成者:
Huan Erdao

入れ子のクラスの概要
 class GeoClusterer.GeoCluster
          GeoCluster class.
 
フィールドの概要
protected  List<GeoClusterer.GeoCluster> clusters_
          Clustered object list.
 int GRIDSIZE
          grid size for clustering.
protected  Handler handler_
          handler to initiate moveend/zoomend event and reset view.
protected  boolean isMoving_
          flag for detecting map moves. true if map is moving or zooming.
protected  List<GeoItem> items_
          GeoItem ArrayList object to be shown.
protected  List<GeoItem> leftItems_
          GeoItem ArrayList object that are out of viewport to be clustered.
protected  MapView mapView_
          MapView object.
private  List<MarkerBitmap> markerIconBmps_
          MarkerBitmap object for marker icons.
protected  GeoBounds savedBounds_
          GeoBound to check moves of the map view.
protected  GeoClusterer.GeoCluster selcluster_
          selected cluster object.
protected  int tapCheckCount_
          check counter for tapping all cluster object.
 
コンストラクタの概要
GeoClusterer(MapView mapView, List<MarkerBitmap> markerIconBmps)

          add item and do clustering.

          add items that were not clustered in last clustering.

          get current Bound

          get current GeoItems list.

          check if the item is within current viewport.
 void onNotifyClearSelectFromCluster(GeoClusterer.GeoCluster caller)
          clear cluster event handler.
 void onNotifyDrawFromCluster()
          Hooking draw event from ClusterMarker to detect zoom/move event.
 void onTapCalledFromCluster(GeoClusterer.GeoCluster caller, boolean isTapped)
          onTap call from Cluster layer.

          re-add items for clustering.
 void redraw()
          redraws clusters
 GeoClusterer.GeoCluster resetViewport()
          reset current viewport.
 void zoomInFixing()
          zoom in with selected cluster to be fit within current viewport.

コンストラクタの詳細

GeoClusterer

public GeoClusterer(MapView mapView,
                    List<MarkerBitmap> markerIconBmps)
パラメータ:
mapView - MapView object.
markerIconBmps - MarkerBitmap objects for icons.
メソッドの詳細

addItem

public void addItem(GeoItem item)
add item and do clustering. NOTE: this method will not redraw screen. after adding all items, you must call redraw() method.

パラメータ:
item - GeoItem to be clustered.

CreateCluster

public void CreateCluster(GeoItem item)
Create Cluster Object. override this method, if you want to use custom GeoCluster class.

パラメータ:
item - GeoItem to be set to cluster.

getItems

public final List<GeoItem> getItems()
get current GeoItems list.

戻り値:
GeoItems list.

redraw

public void redraw()
redraws clusters

zoomInFixing

public void zoomInFixing()
zoom in with selected cluster to be fit within current viewport.

isItemInViewport

private final boolean isItemInViewport(GeoItem item)
check if the item is within current viewport.

戻り値:
true if item is within viewport.

getCurBounds

protected final GeoBounds getCurBounds()
get current Bound

戻り値:
current GeoBounds

getClustersInViewport

protected List<GeoClusterer.GeoCluster> getClustersInViewport()
get clusters within current viewport.

戻り値:
clusters within current viewport.

addLeftItems

private void addLeftItems()
add items that were not clustered in last clustering.

reAddItems

private void reAddItems(List<GeoItem> items)
re-add items for clustering.

パラメータ:
items - GeoItem list to be clustered.

resetViewport

public GeoClusterer.GeoCluster resetViewport()
reset current viewport.

戻り値:
current selected cluster object, if null it means no cluster is selected.

onNotifyDrawFromCluster

public void onNotifyDrawFromCluster()
Hooking draw event from ClusterMarker to detect zoom/move event. hope there will be event notification for android equivalent to javascriptin the future....

onTapCalledFromCluster

public void onTapCalledFromCluster(GeoClusterer.GeoCluster caller,
                                   boolean isTapped)
onTap call from Cluster layer. this method will be called number of times equals to size of clusters. check isTapped to know which cluster was tapped.

パラメータ:
caller - cluster object called this.
isTapped - if true, tapped.

onNotifyClearSelectFromCluster

public void onNotifyClearSelectFromCluster(GeoClusterer.GeoCluster caller)
clear cluster event handler.

パラメータ:
caller - cluster object called this.

getCluster

public GeoClusterer.GeoCluster getCluster(int pos)
get cluster

パラメータ:
pos - position of cluster.
戻り値:
GeoCluster object. null if index out of bounds
